question: Which among the following is the most appropriate definition of Political liberty of Citizens of India ?
option1: Right to participate in the government and assume equal opportunity to assume highest office
option2: right to cast vote and participate in the election process
option3: Equal opportunity to freely move in the Political territories of India
answer: Right to participate in the government and assume equal opportunity to assume highest office
explanation: The rights to life and personal liberty apply for persons of any nationality, while others, such as the freedom of speech and expression are applicable only to the citizens of India (including non-resident Indian citizens).
